text.text: YOU ARE IN THE WRONG DIRECTION.(onthe bus)
A.Excuse me.whereshall I get off? I'm going toHongkou Stadium.
对不起，我在哪儿下车?我去虹口体育场。
B.Hongkou Stadium?But you are in the wrongdirection.
虹口体育场?可是你的方向反了。
真的吗?那我该怎么办呢?
B.Don't worry.Get offat the next stop and you'llsee the bus stop justopposite.
别担心。你下一站下车，你能看见车站，就在马路对面。
